-- | Text matchers
--   
--   Helpers for performing text matches. For more information, please see
--   the Github homepage at
--   
--   <a>http://www.github.com/massysett/matchers</a>
@package matchers
@version 0.24.0.0

module Matchers.Pcre.Base
data CaseSensitive
Sensitive :: CaseSensitive
Insensitive :: CaseSensitive
data PCRE
compile :: CaseSensitive -> Text -> IO (Either String PCRE)
exec :: PCRE -> Text -> IO (Maybe Bool)
instance Eq CaseSensitive
instance Ord CaseSensitive
instance Show CaseSensitive
instance Show PCRE
instance Show PCRE_Extra
instance Show PCREData

module Matchers.Pcre
data CaseSensitive
Sensitive :: CaseSensitive
Insensitive :: CaseSensitive
data PCRE
compile :: CaseSensitive -> Text -> Either String PCRE
exec :: PCRE -> Text -> Maybe Bool

module Matchers
data CaseSensitive
Sensitive :: CaseSensitive
Insensitive :: CaseSensitive
pcre :: CaseSensitive -> Text -> Either String (Pred Text)
within :: CaseSensitive -> Text -> Pred Text
exact :: CaseSensitive -> Text -> Pred Text
